tool_description: Get info + torrent of a movie by its name, in seconds. Returns, posters, release dates, magnet link, provider, ratings, popularity, and even more.
name: EasyTorrents
title: EasyTorrents

api_list.name: EasyTorrents

optional_parameters.name: quality
optional_parameters.description: quality (ex. 720p, HD, Web RIP) can be empty for it to find the best available.
